title: Fragola Pazzo (Crazy Strawberry)
directions: Mix balsamic vinegar, sugar, and black pepper together in a bowl. Add strawberries and stir to coat; marinate in refrigerator until chilled, about 10 minutes. Grate chocolate over top as a garnish.
ingredients: 2 pints fresh strawberries, hulled and quartered
1 (1 ounce) square unsweetened chocolate, grated, or to taste
